website_summaries.verdict: Gas-powered grill with several extras that provide an impressive number of possibilities.
pros: Gas grill with accessories for griddle, grates, and more cooking options
Removable legs make this model portable
cons: The catches could be more durable

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bit of kit, 9/10
customer_reviews.text: The Campingaz party grill 600 had some damage when it was delivered so I had some money returned so a very good service, very good quality product the catches that hold the lid on are a bit flimsy but everything else seems solid to be fair, great design and a pleasure to cook with the hot plate is very good quality and easy to clean, I use a 5kg propane tank that works great heats up within a few minutes the temperature gauge works well, hard to fault very happy 9/10
customer_reviews.author: GAZ

customer_reviews.title: Campingaz multi grill
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for the two of us. Bought just before our recent, post COVID, trips in our campervan (that had been gathering dust & cobwebs since March). Most satisfactory buy we made before taking trips to Somerset and Sussex... Used just about every day... hardly used our internal campervan kitchen because it's so easy to set up and use. Very pleased we bought it, and using again with grandkids too very soon :-)
customer_reviews.author: Ged Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Camping gaz party grill
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic I have used this what I like is that the griddle and the hot plate are on one plate but different sides it’s little bit heavy but comes in a bag the gas pipe doesn’t discount from the bbq it also comes with a heat plate which distributes the heat round your hot plate or griddle you can also put water in the bottom to catch the fat it also comes with a wire ring for using a saucepan on I would recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: BRYAN

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant BBQ
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant bbq I bought it for my husband & he loves it ours is for the caravan when we are away & also use it in the garden , comes with a handy bag that it goes in , easy to put together, & dismantle would recommend to anyone good price as in caravan shops nearly double all none stick to .
customer_reviews.author: TRACY SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Super bbq
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome, easy to put together, great for grilling or baking , we had beef burgers sausage and bacon , and also baked a lasagna in it , it’s so easy to keep clean and the no stick surface is just fantastic you don’t need any extra oil etc . A super bbq for home or. Caravan where I use it . And great value. Super fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: philip cattle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love my first gas barbecue, arrived promptly, well packaged , comes with zip cover bag which is great for storage or transportation .alas not great summer , but managed use it couple of times . Did great job . Dismantles easily to clean . Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before stated date, performed brilliantly and overall very good quality and value for money. No more rusty barbecue as it is so simple to pack away when not in use, would not hesitate to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Evie68

customer_reviews.title: Party Grill, big enough for a party.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good and cheaper alternative to the other very popular camping bbq on the market, I think this is actually slightly bigger too, I am going to use this at home when the summer returns as well as when camping, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Camping BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Fab. Works well fits into it bag easily and it does what it should. One star missing because it is a pain to clean and the water gets really greasy as it would be you then have to dispose of it carefully. We have also used it attaches to the caravan and a bottle at the house. It’s just handy if you don’t won’t to have loads of food or wait ages for all the coal to heat up.
customer_reviews.author: DJW

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic product, all easy to put together and fits lovely in the bag, and looks great and definitely Recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Macfadyen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bbq
customer_reviews.text: This bbq is brilliant. It is very easy to use and cooks sausages, burgers and kebabs to perfection. A great but.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is great little bbq, easy to assemble and use, with a good size grill and very effective “oven” facility, and above all easy to clean. Highly recommend....
customer_reviews.author: G. Durrant

customer_reviews.title: Party grill 👍🏻 Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic hubby’s new Toy a cooker for camping he loved using it on our camping holiday 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: kris6908

customer_reviews.title: Suitability
customer_reviews.text: Brill, great value, a bit heavy but great to cook on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good BBq
customer_reviews.text: Good bbq, central heat plate great for chicken as doesn't tend to burn skin from dripping fat onto an open flame. Easy to assemble and store away.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent brett

customer_reviews.title: Lovely BBQ
customer_reviews.text: This BBQ is great - It's carry bag is weak and useless.... it ripped on the first outing.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had more thumbs to put up
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. very easy to use. Nobody got food poisoning.
customer_reviews.author: Public name

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Man!
customer_reviews.text: Very good versatile fantastic for keeping those food smells out of your caravan it’s very heavy though
customer_reviews.author: Miss R M Delicata

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not used much as it has not been the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Gas Bbq
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant piece of kit, so easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Nigel3a

customer_reviews.title: Would recomend this highly
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bit of kit use it everyday when we are at the caravan. Cooked a variety of dishes on it. Not tried the oven yet though.
customer_reviews.author: LQ

customer_reviews.title: Good grill in use, just needs better finishing.
customer_reviews.text: Just be aware that a lot of the cut edges of the sheet metal are extremely sharp and I've had to smooth them with a file. Other than that, the grill works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom V.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for our first camping trip, easy to assemble, good heat, we even cooked pizzas.
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Marie

customer_reviews.title: top
customer_reviews.text: Great for barbecue food 😋 really pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.author: m k egan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with our caravan and we love it. Easy to set up and use but be warned it is very heavy
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Wicks

customer_reviews.title: This is great for holidays/camping etc
customer_reviews.text: This is great for holidays/camping etc. However, the zip for the carrier bag broke within 5 mins of first opening. Any way this can be replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top BBQ
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant piece of kit. Very easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: a leggett

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Great BBQ, packs up neatly into carrying bag for faking away or to beach
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jan Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to assemble, powerful and usable. I love this brand and it's the second one I buy. Great reseller, perfect packaging and super fast shipment: what else?
customer_reviews.author: Ste

customer_reviews.title: Fairly flimsy to be honest the catches fall off easily and I didn't know u had to fill it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fairly flimsy to be honest the catches fall off easily and I didn't know u had to fill it with water aswell before using it everytime rust hazard waiting to happen
customer_reviews.author: jonny hulatt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camping purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for use with caravan. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: A W.

customer_reviews.title: Bit disappointed with power
customer_reviews.text: Bit disappointed with power, compared to much smaller/cheaper bistro. Managed to break plastic shelf leg holder after water pan detached from base whilst moving across tent. Plastic+camping = breaking = not good enough Can see why Dutch campers go for another make.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gef

product_meta.title: Campingaz Party Grill 600
product_meta.description: Enjoy a great outdoor cookout with the Campingaz Party Grill 600. The system, which comes with a powerful burner, allows multiple cooking options â€“ but still packs into itself for great storage. - Use as a stove, grill, griddle or plancha - Detachable legs - Match free lighting - Easy connection to power - Weight: 10.72kg
